title: Manchester/Victoria-Shopping District
name: The Printworks
content: Entrances on Withy Grove and Thomas Street. Attraction opening times vary. Originally the home of Manchester's newspaper offices, the Printworks is now a covered street where it's night time all day long. It is the home of several well-known restaurants including Hard Rock caf√© Manchester (the only English Hard Rock outside of London) and drinking establishments, as well as a large Odeon cinema, home of Manchester's IMAX screen.
